prompt: What qualities am I grateful to embody?
I am my most authentic self when I…
What part of myself longs for more self-compassion?
My highest values in life are…
What made me smile today?
What comes easily to me these days?
In what ways (small or big) do I impact the world around me?
What habits am I working to change?
What’s something I’m procrastinating on right now? Why am I avoiding it?
What are 3 things I’m grateful for today?
What are the three qualities I love most about myself?
What is the strongest feeling I am experiencing right now?
What are my top fears? How are these fears holding me back?
What do I want to achieve in the next week, month, and year?
I am happy because…
What’s the one thing I couldn’t imagine my life without?
What’s my biggest mistake? What did I learn from it?
What kind of an adult did I want to become as a child? Am I that person now?
What am I proud of the most?
What is the best day in my life so far? Why?
This week’s one worthy memory.
1 thing I learned from today/this week/month/year…
What is my intention for tomorrow?
Today I found bliss in…
What are the aspects of my life that I sometimes take for granted?
What do I value the most in a friend? Who is my closest friend? How have they changed me?
Describe your dream treehouse. How would it look and what would be inside?
Imagine you are a famous inventor. What would you invent and why?
Create a superhero alter ego for yourself. Describe their costume, powers, and mission.
If you could invent a new holiday, what would it be called and how would you celebrate it?
If you could spend a day inside a famous painting, which one would you choose and what would you do there?
Write a letter to your favourite author expressing how their book has impacted you.
Imagine you are the ruler of a magical kingdom. Describe your castle, your subjects, and the laws you would enact.
List your favourite things about yourself and celebrate your unique qualities and strengths.
Imagine you are a character in a delightful children's book. Describe your whimsical world and the adventures you have.
If you could have a personal theme song, what would it be, and why?
